tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE noise_pollution_regulations (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  residential_area_name VARCHAR(255),
  noise_level DECIMAL(10, 2),
  regulation_details TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE noise_levels ( 
    id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    location VARCHAR(255), 
    decibel_level INT
    )

CREATE TABLE noise_sources ( 
    id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    source VARCHAR(255), 
    location_id INT, 
    FOREIGN KEY (location_id) REFERENCES noise_levels(id)
    )

CREATE TABLE complaints ( 
    complaint_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    description TEXT, 
    location_id INT, 
    FOREIGN KEY (location_id) REFERENCES noise_levels(id)
    )

CREATE TABLE inspections ( 
    inspection_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    inspector VARCHAR(255), 
    inspection_date DATE, 
    location_id INT, 
    FOREIGN KEY (location_id) REFERENCES noise_levels(id)
    )

CREATE TABLE fines ( 
    fine_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    amount DECIMAL(10, 2), 
    complaint_id INT, 
    FOREIGN KEY (complaint_id) REFERENCES complaints(complaint_id)
    )
